summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Board of Adjustment (Panel C) of the City of Dallas will convene on February 22, 2024, for a briefing at 10:30 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall, Room 6ES, and will also be accessible via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to address various zoning and adjustment requests from residents.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The agenda includes a staff presentation, public hearing, public testimony, and the approval of previous meeting minutes. The Board will review a docket of cases, including uncontested items, holdover items, and individual cases requiring decisions.

**Important Details**:  
Significant proposals include several requests for variances and special exceptions related to fence height regulations, front-yard setbacks, and single-family use regulations. Specific cases include applications from Ludovic Gombos for a special exception at 3321 Coronet Boulevard, and Blanca Cardenas for a variance at 4859 Corrigan Drive, among others.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking approval for the minutes from the December 11, 2023 meeting and will deliberate on the individual cases presented, making decisions on the requested variances and exceptions. Public testimony will be taken into account before final decisions are made.
